description.@en: We shall slip between the material world and where the spirits dwell, to emerge on the other side.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, you and a number of persons equal to 6+[WB] instantaneously travel to another location. You can only travel to specific location you have previously visited. Upon arrival, everyone excep for you suffers [[/roll 2D10+2]] Peril.

criticalFailure.@en: You and your comrades step into an everwidening dark pit, which swallows you all whole. It spits you back out where you started, and you all are instantly Incapacitated!, gaining 6 Conflict.

reagents.@en: A powdered sapphire, laid at the foot of a doorway (expended)
